Name: Sparrow
Description: A small, common bird found in urban and rural areas.

Name: Eagle
Description: A large bird of prey known for its powerful flight and keen eyesight.

Name: Penguin
Description: A flightless bird known for its tuxedo-like appearance.

Name: Owl
Description: A nocturnal bird of prey with excellent night vision.

Name: Hawk
Description: A bird of prey with sharp talons and a powerful beak.

Name: Kingfisher
Description: A colorful bird known for its remarkable fishing skills.

Name: Robin
Description: A small, cheerful bird often associated with the arrival of spring.

Name: Parrot
Description: A vibrant and intelligent bird often kept as a pet.

Name: Swan
Description: A graceful bird known for its elegance and long neck.

Name: Woodpecker
Description: A bird with a distinctive hammering sound while feeding.
